name: Desert of Doitjma
storyline: Desert of Doitjma is the first chapter of Desert of Doitjma's series. You have to become Junji, Gabriela and paleontologist Dr. Frank and go to the Desert of Doitjma for a rescue expedition. Dr. Frank is an important paleontologist working at the Department of Paleontology of the N. University of Sapporo, Japan, and his research on Doitjmas led Junji and Gabriela to find him. But... who are Gabriela and Junji? What is Doitjma? Embark on this thrilling first chapter and search for your answers!
summary: Follow Murphy on this evil adventure. Survive all the sectors and collect the keys from this alternate reality to fight Doitjma itself for Earth's freedom!
